content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case involving the dissolution of a joint ownership between two parties the court in bologna made a decision on july 25 2022 after a hearing on july 21 2022 the case has been ongoing for several years the court found that the parties should come to a mutually agreed solution and ordered the dissolution of the joint property as described in the initial agreement the costs of the case including legal representation and expert opinions will be divided between the parties based on their inheritance shares the courts ruling disregarded any exceptions or objections raised by the parties the legal principle applied in this case is article 720 of the civil procedure code which deals with the revocation of disqualification or incapacity the case involves children who are heirs to a deceased person and their litigation against their brothers the court has determined that the inheritance should be divided equally between the children and the remaining half should go to the heirs of their deceased father an expert has been appointed to assess the property and a hearing has taken place one of the heirs has passed away and their children have joined the litigation contesting the expert report the trial was discontinued due to the intervening death the court has invited the parties to submit closing statements and replies the defendant has objected to the partial division of the inheritance citing previous court rulings on the principle of universality division the court acknowledges the admissibility of the division but notes the impracticability of dividing certain portions of the property according to the expert report the court suggests finding a mutually agreed solution and remands the case accordingly the costs of the proceedings will be divided among the parties based on their inheritance shares the court has made a final decision ordering the dissolution of the joint property and has sent the case back to the judge for a preliminary attempt at conciliation the next hearing is scheduled for september 15 2022 the court has adjourned the case and notice of the decision has been given
